summary:
Did you always wanted a Mannequin follower too? Then this Mod is perfect for you!
It adds a Spell wich allows you to Conjure a Mannequin permanetly!
But you won\'t get the Spelltome as a Present! You have to figth for it!
descriptionHtml:
Did you always wanted a Mannequin follower too? Then this Mod is perfect for you!
It adds a Spell wich allows you to Conjure a Mannequin permanetly!
But you don\'t get the Spelltome as a Present! You have to figth for it!

Thanks to \"FinalNumber\" for this reviews:
[youtube]gQ53pP-Uf_U[/youtube]

[youtube]II0YLLNACWo[/youtube]

Where to find the Spelltome:

I added a trapdoor to the big tree in whiterun (screenshot) where you can enter a little dungeon called \"Mannequins Hide\" wich is a bit like a place for an underground mannequin movement. I think it looks kind of misterious.
When you enter the Dungeon there will be a very powerful mannequin. If you kill him, take the Spelltome wich is on the Altar (screenshot).

About the Mannequin Follower:

-Weapons: Ebony Mace, Ebony Bow, Ebony Arrows
-Spells: Flames, Firebolt
-Perks: None (yet)

Bugs: None known (yet)

if you find any bugs, please tell me in a comment.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Latest Version: 1.3

Update 1.1:

Makes the Mannequin in the Dungeon more powerful, because it was too easy before. Now you will have a real challange, but he isn\'t OP. I think he is just rigth for a boss.

Update 1.2:

Bugfix. You can\'t activate or trade items with the Mannequin anymore. No more Bugs known.

Update 1.3:

Added a second floor to the dungeon called \"Mannequins Hide Sanctum\". Now you there is no more book in the first floor, you have to finish the second floor to get the spelltome. There are also some Treasure Chests, but you have to find the key (in the dungeon) first. The key isn\'t very hard to find but you have to look around a little bit. To enter the second stage you have to kill the first mannequin and take his/its key.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you like this mod Please leave a comment with some feedback or ideas for improving this mod, or even ideas for other mods.
So have fun with this mod and have a nice day!
author: T3rRoR_SoLdi3R
